metadata.title: CVE-2019-6476 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A defect in code added to support QNAME minimization can cause named toexit with an assertion failure if a forwarder returns a referral ratherthan resolving the query. This affects BIND versions 9.14.0 up to 9.14.6,and 9.15.0 up to 9.15.4.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
